title: The Importance of Investing in Medical Research
itunes:title: The Importance of Investing in Medical Research
description:
Dr. Kevin Tracey, CEO of the Feinstein Institutes for Medical Research, discusses the need for developing more treatments for COVID-19 and other viruses. Bloomberg Opinion Politics Columnist Jonathan Bernstein explains why getting an infrastructure deal wasn't simple. Chainalysis CEO Michael Gronager talks about raising $100 million in funding for the blockchain analysis company. And we Drive to the Close with Christian Munafo, CIO at Liberty Street Advisors. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
